channel.title: Im making my first script and i need some help!
channel.description: Ok i have just started my first script an auto alcher but im trying to add ltos of antiban........ive already made the mouse hover over the mage thingy and it randomly moves screen but i have no clue hwo to make it log in and out...................could soem1 plz post procedure where to put it in script and watever else ;D

item.source: Im making my first script and i need some help!

item.title: Im making my first script and i need some help!
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I added Declareplayers; in it for you like you said…
[scar]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Auto Alcher by Wtf I Sp4nk
//First Script
//I will be updating frequently
//Enjoy
//Rember I 0wn
//
//Not my fault if u get Banned
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program Alcher;

{.include srl/srl.scar}

var talk, alched: integer;

//////////////////SET to the Up//////////////////

const AlchNumber = 100; //# of times to alch

const StartPlayer =0;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';          //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := '';               //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := '';  //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

procedure alch;

begin
if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
wait(1500+random(600));
ClickMouse(710,324,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
ClickMouse(710,324,true);
alched:=(alched+1);
end;

procedure SendText4(Text: string);
var
i: Integer;
begin
for i := 1 to Length(Text) do
begin
SendKeys(Text[i]);
Wait(50 + Random(100));
end;
SendKeys(chr(13));
end;

Procedure RandTalk;
var chance:integer;
begin

chance:=1+random(20)
if (chance=1)then
begin
talk:=1+random(100)
if(talk=1) then
begin
sendtext4(‘I irishleg I 0wnz all’ )

end;
if(talk=2) then
begin
sendtext4(‘If u see i irishleg i in wild ur dead’ )

end;
if(talk=3) then
begin
sendtext4(‘I irishleg I is best pekr in game!!!’ )

end;
if (talk=4) then
begin
sendtext4(‘irishleg will 3 hit u!’ )

end;
if (talk=5) then
begin
sendtext4(‘This is so boring…’ )
;
end;
if (talk=6) then
begin
sendtext4(‘Irishleg has an abby whip…’ )

end;
if (talk=7) then
begin
sendtext4(‘go blink182!’ )

end;
if (talk=8) then
begin
sendtext4(‘go franz ferdinand!’ )

end;
if (talk=9) then
begin
sendtext4(‘must…get…lvs up!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=10) then
begin
sendtext4(‘die little chiken man!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=11) then
begin
sendtext4(‘Lalalala’ )
;
end;
if (talk=12) then
begin
sendtext4(‘Punk 4 life’ )
;
end;
if (talk=13)then
begin
sendtext4(‘Grr leveling is so slow’ )
;
end;
if (talk=14) then
begin
sendtext4(‘Im sooooooooooooo bored’ )
;
end;
if (talk=15) then
begin
sendtext4(‘i love chicks’ )
;
end;
if (talk=16) then
begin
sendtext4(‘they r so cool’ )
;
end;
if (talk=17) then
begin
sendtext4(‘Eat this monster dude!’ )
;
end;
if(talk=18) then
begin
sendtext4(‘wish i had food’ )
;
end;
if(talk=19) then
begin
sendtext4(‘my construction lvl is 42!!!’ )
;
end;
if(talk=20) then
begin
sendtext4(‘need 4m cash for a penos!!!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=21) then

end;
if (talk=61) then

end;
if (talk=62) then

;

if (talk=63) then

;
end;
if (talk=64) then

if (talk=65) then

end;
if (talk=73) then

if (talk=74) then

;
end;
if (talk=75) then

;

if (talk=76) then

if (talk=77) then

if (talk=78) then
begin

end;
if (talk=79) then

;

if (talk=80) then

if (talk=86) then

end;
if (talk=89) then

sendtext4(’…’ )
;
end;
if (talk=90) then
begin
sendtext4(‘more mage!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=91) then
begin
sendtext4(’…’ )
;
end;
if (talk=92) then
begin
sendtext4(‘grrr runescape!!!u addicting’ )
;
end;
if (talk=93) then
begin
sendtext4(’…’ )
;
end;
if (talk=94) then
begin
sendtext4(’…’ )
;
end;
if (talk=95) then
begin
sendtext4(‘i hate yous!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=96) then
begin
sendtext4(‘ooooooo’ )
;
end;

begin
sendtext4(‘so close!’ )
;
end;

;
end;

begin
sendtext4(‘ark!’ )
;
end;
if (talk=100) then
begin
sendtext4(‘w0ot im almost done’ );
end;
end;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
ActivateClient;
declareplayers;
If(not(LoggedIn))then
LoginPlayer;
If(LoggedIn)then
Status(‘Alching ’ + inttostr(alchnumber) + ’ Items’);
begin
if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
HoverEvery(1+random(3),‘magic’);
RotateEvery(1+random(3));
LogOutEvery(1, 30);//<-- the 1 is the hours you want to log out for,
//and the 30 is for how many minutes you want
//stay logged out for, change them if you like
repeat
alch;
until(alchnumber=alched)
end;
end.[/scar]

~jR

EDIT:Added LogOutEvery; proceure to main loop

if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
HoverEvery(1+random(3),‘magic’);
RotateEvery(1+random(3));
repeat
alch;
until(alchnumber=alched)
end;
end.[/scar]

~jR

[scar]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Auto Alcher by Wtf I Sp4nk
//First Script
//I will be updating frequently
//Enjoy
//Rember I 0wn
//
//Not my fault if u get Banned
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program Alcher;

{.include srl/srl.scar}

var talk,alched, : integer;

//////////////////SET to the Up//////////////////

const AlchNumber = 100; //# of times to alch

const StartPlayer:=0;

procedure alch;

begin
if(not(gametab(7))) then
gametab(7);
wait(1500+random(600));
ClickMouse(710,324,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
ClickMouse(710,324,true);
alched:=(alched+1);
end;

procedure LogOutEvery(hours, forxmins: Integer);

procedure SendText4(Text: string);
var
i: Integer;
begin
for i := 1 to Length(Text) do
begin
SendKeys(Text[i]);
Wait(50 + Random(100));
end;
SendKeys(chr(13));
end;

Procedure RandTalk;
var chance:integer;
begin

chance:=1+random(20)
if (chance=1)then
begin
talk:=1+random(100)

begin
sendtext4(‘I irishleg I 0wnz all’ )

item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Here is a basic script to Login a player, and Logout.

[scar]program New;

const StartPlayer:=0;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers:=1;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

Players[0].Name:=‘Username’;
Players[0].Pass:=‘Password’;
Players[0].Nick :=‘rna’;
Players[0].Active:=True;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
DelcarePlayers;
LoginPlayer; //Logs in Username.
Logout;
end;[/scar]
Players[0].Active:=True;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
DelcarePlayers
